name: gptscript
description: Develop LLM Apps in Natural Language

repo.name: gptscript
repo.description: Build AI assistants that interact with your systems

readme.summary: Excellent clarity and installation instructions with good quick start, but lacks configuration documentation and troubleshooting guidance.
readme.top_issue: No documentation on configuration options, environment variables, or how to set/use the required OpenAI API key

injection_risks.description: Potential JSON injection vulnerability in the http handler function. The json decoder does not validate the input data, which could lead to a denial of service attack.
Potential JSON injection vulnerability in the recreateAllCredentials function. The json decoder does not validate the input data, which could lead to a denial of service attack.

critical_findings: Potential JSON injection vulnerability in the http handler function.
Lack of input validation and sanitization in the recreateAllCredentials function.
security.summary: The code has some security concerns, including potential JSON injection vulnerabilities and lack of input validation, but it does not expose any sensitive information or secrets.

common_complaints: TUI crashes on tool execution errors
Unclear positioning relative to MCP - documentation gaps
sentiment.summary: Community shows moderate frustration with bugs and unclear documentation, but no signs of project abandonment; maintainers appear slow to respond to open issues.

communication.summary: Maintainer responses are generally clear and helpful, showing patience with users. However, there is room for deeper technical explanations.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being recent (2025-12-17)
84 open issues with no resolution activity
Zero closed issues in past 6 months
No merged PRs in past 6 months
Zero active contributors in past 6 months
High issue backlog with no maintenance response
maintenance.summary: gptscript is abandoned with no maintenance activity for 6+ months despite a recent commit timestamp, indicating the repository is unmaintained and unresponsive to issues.

project_metrics.description: Build AI assistants that interact with your systems
